page.title: 13RELIGION
page.content:
At Hazelwood there is a{C.E Church, {St.John the Evangelist}having links with the Church controlled school. There is only 1 C.of E. Church in Milford, the{Holy Trinity}built in 1846. It shares it's vicar with St. Peter's at Belper. One{Methodist church survives in Milford,one having closed through lack of support. A school survey at St. Johns amongst children who go regularly to church said on religion:_ 15% attend{St. Peter's C.of E. 7% the{Central Methodist 3% the{Elim Pentacostal 1% the{Baptist Church.
Only 5% of the St.Peter's parish attend church regularly.
